newsitem.title: USA: NHP to buy commercial mortgage bank firm.
newsitem.headline: NHP to buy commercial mortgage bank firm.

text.p: NHP Inc said on Thursday its Washington Mortgage Financial Group subsidiary has signed an agreement to purchase Detroit-based Proctor & Associates, the largest commercial mortgage banking firm in Michigan.
The acquisition marked the continuation of Washington Mortgage's strategy to gain national market dominance in the commercial mortgage banking field, the company said.
The deal included Proctor's $1.2 billion loan servicing portfolio and the firm's 15 active correspondent relationships with life insurance companies, NHP said.
Proctor originated nearly $320 million in commercial mortage loans in 1995, the company said.
